amendment.description: To provide for payments to the New York State Uninsured Employers Fund for reimbursement of claims related to the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001, and payments to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for treatment for emergency services personnel and rescue and recovery personnel.

action.text: Amendment SA 2313 proposed by Senator Clinton.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2313 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
